landing.corePointsAdmin: Admin panel for the modern age
landing.corePointsAdminDetails: Manage your products, orders, campaigns and more from a single place. See how your store is doing with the built-in analytics
landing.corePointsStoreDetails: Your job is to manage your products, and we will take care of the rest. Blazing fast, SEO optimized, and user-friendly website within a click away. We take care of the complexity of making your store run 24x7, all you need to do is sell
landing.corePointsSupportDetails: We are here to help with whatever you need. Whether you are stuck, or you have a feature you can't live without, we want to hear from you. Message us using the built-in chat, and we'll help you succeed
landing.stepAddProductsDetails: We have no limits, so add as many as you want
landing.stepCreateStoreDetails: Sign up, tell us your store name, add your logo, and you're ready to go
landing.stepStartSellingDetails: Add your preferred delivery and payment methods, and start selling
landing.warmingUpDetails: This is just the beginning. We continuously improve, and we have big plans to build the best platform in the region. Join us now

landingFaq.paymentsAnswerSupportedMethods: Currently we support payment on delivery and credit card payments. If we currently don't support your bank, we can work together and add support for it within 1 week
landingFaq.paymentsQuestionSupportedMethods: What payment methods can I use?
landingFaq.pricingAnswerSignContract: There are no contracts or obligations, you can stop using the platform whenever you want.
landingFaq.pricingQuestionSignContract: Do I need to sign a contract?

seoDescriptions.product_plural: Shop online thousands of products in one place. Quickest way to buy online in Macedonia. We offer high-quality products at affordable prices. Join us now
seoDescriptions.storeGeneric: The easiest way to shop in Macedonia, from the comfort of your home. Online shopping could never be easier. Start shopping.
